stylesheet: body { font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 11pt; line-height: 1.6; } h1 { font-size: 18pt; margin-top: 24pt; } h2 { font-size: 16pt; margin-top: 20pt; } h3 { font-size: 14pt; margin-top: 16pt; } code { font-family: 'Courier New', monospace; background: #f5f5f5; padding: 2px 4px; } pre { background: #f5f5f5; padding: 12px; overflow-x: auto; } table { border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; margin: 12pt 0; } th, td { border: 1px solid #ddd; padding: 8px; text-align: left; }
